Social media account of the Mat-Su Monitor, student paper of Mat-Su College in Palmer, Alaska. MSC is part of the University of Alaska system.

We follow back!

Disclaimers: This account does not reflect the opinions of anyone outside the Mat-Su Monitor. In fact, it barely reflects the opinions of those inside the Mat-Su Monitor! We don't speak for MSC or UA.

ANYTHING we do on here =/= endorsement

note: THE REPRESSIONS are an NYC forest-music/folk-punk band, featuring Barbara Dragon and Nate Lay. They write songs about books, nature, defending animals, injustice, and mental health. You can find their music on all major streaming platforms and see their live shows live in New York City and twice weekly on their Twitch channel. The band dedicates their music to anyone who has ever been made to feel small for being sensitive, kind, smart, or ill.

My name's Shawn, howler0502's just the handle/email I've gone with for close to 30 years now. I'm disabled, a sometimes poet, sometimes writer. Gen-X. Philosophically absurdist. My interests are wide, varied, and inconsistent. He/him
